server module¶

exception server.ValidationError(message)¶

Bases: Exception

server.add_HR()¶

Store HR data with time stamp and sends email if tachycardic

Parameters:
  • patient_id (key) – id of patient
  • heart_rate (key) – HR data want to enter
Returns:

says data was added
Return type:

result (string)
Raises:
  • ValidationError – Wrong keys given
  • ValidationError – Patient doesn’t exist
server.add_new_p()¶

Add new patient to data base

Parameters:
  • patient_id (key) – numerical id of patient
  • user_age (key) – age of patient
  • attending_email (key) – patient email
Returns:

prints if patient was saved
Return type:

result

Returns: if patient added to database

server.calc_int_avg()¶

Calculate average HR over an interval

Returns:average over the interval
Return type:int_avg (json)
server.calculate_avg_HR(patient_id)¶

Average of HR data for all measurements

Parameters:patient_id (int) – id of specified patient
Returns:json with value of average HR
Return type:ave (json)
Raises:ValidationError – user doesn’t exist
server.determine_tachy(patient_id)¶

Return if patient is tachy from most recent measurement and time stamp, send email if tachy

Parameters:patient_id (str) –
Returns:if tachy or not time (str): time stamp
Return type:ans_str (str)
Raises:ValidationError – User doesn’t exist
server.get_heart_rate(patient_id)¶

Return all previous HR data

Parameters:

patient_id – ID of patient you want data for
Returns:

json of all HR data
Return type:

HRdata (json)
Raises:
  • ValidationError – User doesn’t exist
  • ValidationError – No HR data for user

Parameters:a (json) – keys input by user
Raises:Validation Error – If missing key
